title: Warm leek & white bean salad with mustard dressing

ingredients.item: 410g tin White beans, such as cannellini, drained and rinsed
2 Large leeks, trimmed, washed and finely sliced

instructions.step: Heat 2 tbsp oil in a large frying pan over a medium heat. Add the leeks and a good pinch of salt. As soon as the leeks begin to soften, turn down the heat fairly low and continue to cook for 10 minutes, stirring from time to time, until they are soft (donâ€™t let them take on any colour).  Add the beans and toss together until heated through. Take off the heat; stir in the parsley and plenty of black pepper.  For the dressing, whisk together the mustards, vinegar, sugar and remaining oil and season well. Stir into the pan of warm leeks and beans.
